subjectPatterns.?targetIdentifier: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> { ?manifestation a schema:CreativeWork ; schema:isPartOf btid:beltransCorpus ; dcterms:identifier ?targetIdentifier . }

sourceLanguage.subject: ?targetIdentifier
sourceLanguage.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> {?manifestation schema:translationOfWork ?original . } graph <http://beltrans-originals> { ?original schema:inLanguage ?lang . } graph <http://master-data> { ?lang mads:authoritativeLabel ?langLabel . } FILTER(lang(?langLabel) = 'en')

targetKBREdition.subject: ?targetIdentifier
targetKBREdition.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> {?manifestation schema:sameAs ?localURI . } graph <http://kbr-syracuse> { ?localURI a schema:CreativeWork ; schema:bookEdition ?edition . }

targetBnFEdition.subject: ?targetIdentifier
targetBnFEdition.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> {?manifestation schema:sameAs ?localURI . } graph <http://bnf-publications> { ?localURI a schema:CreativeWork ; schema:bookEdition ?edition . }

targetKBEdition.subject: ?targetIdentifier
targetKBEdition.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> {?manifestation schema:sameAs ?localURI . } graph <http://kb-publications> { ?localURI a schema:CreativeWork ; schema:bookEdition ?edition . }

targetBindingType.subject: ?targetIdentifier
targetBindingType.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> { ?manifestation schema:sameAs ?localURI . } graph <http://kbr-syracuse> { ?localURI schema:bookFormat ?bindingType . } graph <http://master-data> { ?bindingType rdfs:label ?bindingTypeLabel . } FILTER(lang(?bindingTypeLabel = 'en'))

targetBookFormat.subject: ?targetIdentifier
targetBookFormat.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> { ?manifestation schema:sameAs ?localURI . } graph <http://kb-publications> { ?localURI schema:bookFormat ?bookFormat . } graph <http://master-data> { ?bookFormat rdfs:label ?bookFormatLabel . }

targetCollectionIdentifier.subject: ?targetIdentifier
targetCollectionIdentifier.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> {?manifestation schema:sameAs ?kbrManifestation . } graph <http://kbr-syracuse> {?kbrManifestation schema:isPartOf ?collection . ?collection dcterms:identifier ?collectionID ; schema:name ?collectionName .}

author-scenarist.subject: ?targetIdentifier
author-scenarist.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> {?manifestation schema:author|marcrel:sce ?contributor .} graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor schema:name ?contributorName ; dcterms:identifier ?contributorID . } FILTER(lang(?contributorName) = '')

authorIdentifiers.subject: ?targetIdentifier
authorIdentifiers.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> {?manifestation schema:author ?contributor .} graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor schema:name ?contributorName ; dcterms:identifier ?contributorID . } FILTER(lang(?contributorName) = '')

translator-adapter.subject: ?targetIdentifier
translator-adapter.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> {?manifestation schema:translator|marcrel:adp ?contributor .} graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor schema:name ?contributorName ; dcterms:identifier ?contributorID . } FILTER(lang(?contributorName) = '')

translatorIdentifiers.subject: ?targetIdentifier
translatorIdentifiers.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> {?manifestation schema:translator ?contributor .} graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor schema:name ?contributorName ; dcterms:identifier ?contributorID . } FILTER(lang(?contributorName) = '')

adapterIdentifiers.subject: ?targetIdentifier
adapterIdentifiers.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> {?manifestation marcrel:adp ?contributor .} graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor schema:name ?contributorName ; dcterms:identifier ?contributorID . } FILTER(lang(?contributorName) = '')

illustratorIdentifiers.subject: ?targetIdentifier
illustratorIdentifiers.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> {?manifestation marcrel:ill ?contributor .} graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor schema:name ?contributorName ; dcterms:identifier ?contributorID . } FILTER(lang(?contributorName) = '')

scenaristIdentifiers.subject: ?targetIdentifier
scenaristIdentifiers.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> {?manifestation marcrel:sce ?contributor .} graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor schema:name ?contributorName ; dcterms:identifier ?contributorID . } FILTER(lang(?contributorName) = '')

publishingDirectorIdentifiers.subject: ?targetIdentifier
publishingDirectorIdentifiers.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> {?manifestation marcrel:pbd ?contributor .} graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor schema:name ?contributorName ; dcterms:identifier ?contributorID . } FILTER(lang(?contributorName) = '')

targetPublisherIdentifiers.subject: ?targetIdentifier
targetPublisherIdentifiers.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> {?manifestation marcrel:pbl ?contributor .} graph <http://beltrans-contributors> {?contributor dcterms:identifier ?contributorID } OPTIONAL { graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor schema:name ?contributorNameNoLang .} FILTER(lang(?contributorNameNoLang) = '')} OPTIONAL { graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor schema:name ?contributorNameEN .} FILTER(lang(?contributorNameEN) = 'en')} OPTIONAL {graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor schema:name ?contributorNameNL .} FILTER(lang(?contributorNameNL) = 'nl')} OPTIONAL {graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor schema:name ?contributorNameFR .} FILTER(lang(?contributorNameFR) = 'fr')} BIND(COALESCE(?contributorNameNoLang, ?contributorNameEN, ?contributorNameNL, ?contributorNameFR, 'no name') AS ?contributorName)

sourceKBRIdentifier.subject: ?targetIdentifier
sourceKBRIdentifier.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> {?manifestation schema:translationOfWork ?original . } graph <http://beltrans-originals> { ?original schema:sameAs ?localURI . } graph <http://kbr-originals> { ?localURI a schema:CreativeWork ; dcterms:identifier ?identifier . } FILTER(! STRSTARTS(STR(?identifier), 'source'))

sourceThesaurusBB.subject: ?targetIdentifier
sourceThesaurusBB.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> { ?manifestation schema:translationOfWork ?original . } graph <http://beltrans-originals> {?original schema:sameAs ?kbrOriginal . } graph <http://kbr-syracuse> { ?kbrOriginal schema:about ?bb . } graph <http://master-data> { ?bb skos:prefLabel ?bbLabel . } FILTER(lang(?bbLabel) = 'en')

sourcePublisherIdentifiers.subject: ?targetIdentifier
sourcePublisherIdentifiers.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> { ?manifestation schema:translationOfWork ?original . } graph <http://beltrans-originals> {?original schema:publisher ?contributor .} graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor dcterms:identifier ?contributorID . } OPTIONAL { graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor schema:name ?contributorNameNoLang .} FILTER(lang(?contributorNameNoLang) = '')} OPTIONAL { graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor schema:name ?contributorNameEN .} FILTER(lang(?contributorNameEN) = 'en')} OPTIONAL {graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor schema:name ?contributorNameNL .} FILTER(lang(?contributorNameNL) = 'nl')} OPTIONAL {graph <http://beltrans-contributors> { ?contributor schema:name ?contributorNameFR .} FILTER(lang(?contributorNameFR) = 'fr')} BIND(COALESCE(?contributorNameNoLang, ?contributorNameEN, ?contributorNameNL, ?contributorNameFR, 'no name') AS ?contributorName)

sourcePublisherInfoEstimated.subject: ?targetIdentifier
sourcePublisherInfoEstimated.pattern: graph <http://beltrans-manifestations> { ?manifestation schema:translationOfWork ?original . } graph <http://beltrans-originals> { ?original prov:qualifiedInfluence ?i . } BIND( IF( EXISTS { graph <http://beltrans-originals> { ?i up:assertionType up:HumanAsserted . } }, 'yes', 'no') as ?estimationInfo)
